title: T206 Bat Off Shoulder Ty Cobb PSA 3
author: cobblove

posts.post_title: T206 Bat Off Shoulder Ty Cobb PSA 3
posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://i86.photobucket.com/albums/k107/peterosepsa/T206cobbs.jpg[/IMG]
Card has never been sent in for review but this is the highest a 3 can get. Very clean with no stains just 1 faint crease and dead centered front and back. 


950.00

Cobb back added. Its not a Red Hindu or anything but its well centered with no back damage.
[IMG]http://i86.photobucket.com/albums/k107/peterosepsa/cobbback-1.jpg[/IMG]

Price 950.00
Very clean cobb. Great eye appeal on this gem
Do you still have the Green portrait?
